ygData.subject: Re: Jewelry with moonstones?
ygData.msgSnippet: you get them for trading Gnoll teeth in Qeynos to a guard who really hates gnolls.  Some people don t know you can then take those moonstones and trade them at
ygData.messageBody:
you get them for trading Gnoll teeth in Qeynos to a guard who really
hates gnolls. Some people don't know you can then take those moonstones
and trade them at the Pub at the docks for a short ale per moonstone.
Good for alchohol resistance and they sell for a decent amount (compared
to the moonstone).

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Devorkin [mailto:devo@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 8:49 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Jewelry with moonstones?


From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>

okay, now what is a moonstone???
